p: For the influenza A virus, the WHO ILI case definition showed the best performance in both all weeks (aDOR 2.81; 95% CI 2.47–3.20) and in epidemic weeks (aDOR 2.16; 95% CI 1.82–2.57). The symptom that performed best in both was fever in all weeks (aDOR 4.29; 95% CI 3.46–5.32) and in epidemic weeks (2.72; 95% CI 2.06–3.59).
